text: Too Many Husbands is a 1940 American romantic comedy movie directed by Wesley Ruggles and was based on the 1919 play of the same name by W. Somerset Maugham. It stars Jean Arthur, Fred MacMurray, Melvyn Douglas, Harry Davenport, Dorothy Peterson, Meville Cooper and was distributed by Columbia Pictures. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 1941. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1940 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Wesley Ruggles
title: Too Many Husbands
